BE.name: Shin Chan Vol. 1
BE.description: Rating suitable for 12 years and over. There are two free episodes included in this volume! Shin Chan is the nickname of the hero, Shinnosuke Nohara. He is a foulmouthed, lively and tireless 5-year-old boy. He’s crazy about beautiful girls, chocolate cookies and the Ultra Hero series. Oh! And teasing his mother, Misae. He has the ability of finding the weak point of those around him and ridiculing them -family, schoolmates... he drives them all to despair! The whole neighborhood suffers at his hands! Episode 8: Hey, Himawari Is a Princess! Hey, It’s Mommy First Gray Hair! Hey, Michi and Yoshirin Are Moving! Episode 10: Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii! (part 1) Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii! (part 2) Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii! (part 3)

AT.name: Shin Chan Vol. 1
AT.description: Altersfreigabe: Dieser Film ist für Kinder ab 12 Jahren geeignet. Diese Software ist nur auf Englisch verfügbar. There are two free episodes included in this volume! And teasing his mother, Misae. He has the ability of finding the weak point of those around him and ridiculing them -family, schoolmates... he drives them all to despair! The whole neighborhood suffers at his hands! Episode 8: Hey, Himawari Is a Princess! Hey, It’s Mommy First Gray Hair! Hey, Michi and Yoshirin Are Moving! Episode 10: Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii! (part 1) Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii! (part 2) Hey, We’re Off to Hawaii! (part 3)
